message: Let's start with a fair split, Bob. I'll take 80% and you can take 20%
Let's split it evenly, Alice.  It's the fairest way to start.
You're not getting off that easily, Bob. I'll give you 40% this time, but I'm taking the majority.
Alice, let's try to be a little more reasonable. I'll take a little less than you this time, but we can both get closer to an even split.
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. I'll give you 30% this time, but I'm taking the lion's share.
Alice, let's compromise.  I'm willing to take less than what I proposed before.  It's in our best interests to reach an agreement before we both lose too much to inflation.
